Entrepreneur, Pace Thyself

Most entrepreneurs dream of a lifetime of new ideas and businesses. But for this to happen, they must work at a sustainable pace.

inc. magazine
Apr 17

By Dorcas Cheng-Tozun

Consider this: How many entrepreneurs dream of starting only one business? And how many entrepreneurs are healthy, balanced people?
